testimonials.body: Highly refined sense of design and aesthetics; Very passionate individual who puts in a lot of thought to his work; Detail oriented; Good communication and understands requirements; Patient and cooperative; Takes feedback well. We recruited us for our second project already!

testimonials.body: Them delivered a logo that met and exceeded our expectations, the first go. The logo presented to us was simple (in the best way possible), bold, and captured who we are as a company. We could not be any happier and would gladly work with Br.Storm again!

testimonials.body: The best designers I’ve ever worked with, they know a lot about visual identity and took care of every detail so that the result turned out unique as I wanted.
